styleConfig.emailCaptureContainer: height: 50px; width: 50%; margin-bottom: 1em;align-items: stretch; @media (max-width: 68.75rem) { width: 90%; } @media (max-width: 34.375rem) { height: revert; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 12px; }
styleConfig.emailAddressInput: font-size: 16px; padding: 0 20px; border-radius: 4px; border-top-right-radius: 0; border-bottom-right-radius: 0; @media (max-width: 34.375rem) { flex-basis: 50px; width: 100%; border-top-right-radius: 4px; border-bottom-right-radius: 4px; }
styleConfig.subscribeBtn: height: 100%; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 700; padding-inline: 12px; border-radius: 4px; border-top-left-radius: 0; border-bottom-left-radius: 0; flex-shrink: 0; @media (max-width: 34.375rem) { border-top-left-radius: 4px; border-bottom-left-radius: 4px; height:40px; }

config.text:
There are nearly two million active websites on the Internet with more than five million blog posts uploaded every day! That is a lot of information! We heavily rely on the World Wide Web not only for communication but also for information. No matter how trivial it may be, there are millions of websites offering countless blogs on your query. But how do you know whether a website has credible information? Welcome to SearchAlts.com – The website with the most accurate information on a variety of categories.

Whether you are looking for the best dog food for your furry little friend, or best ways to reduce weight, SearchAlts.com has got it all! Our website lists the most updated and relevant blogs that offer credible information on a wide range of categories like nutrition, health, pets, and much more. Many websites often have outdated information that may not be helpful. But with the “Recent Articles” section on SearchAlts.com, you can stay abreast with the latest information. You can also catch up with the current trends across the globe by reading blogs from our “Most Read Articles” and “Trending Articles” section.

Subscribe to our newsletter if you want to be the first to read our recently uploaded articles. We promise not to spam your inbox! And if you have any other queries, feel free to reach us by dropping your name, email, and query.

So, log on to SearchAlts.com today, and never miss an update.

styleConfig.imageContainer: height: 450px; float: right; margin-left: 32px; margin-bottom: 32px; @media (max-width: 68.75rem) {height: 350px;} @media (max-width: 34.375rem) {margin-bottom: 20px; margin-left: 0; float: none; width: 100%; height: 300px;}

height: 450px; float: right; margin-left: 32px; margin-bottom: 32px; @media (max-width: 68.75rem) {height: 350px;}; @media (max-width: 34.375rem) {margin-bottom: 20px; margin-left: 0; float: none; width: 100%; height: 300px;}
